titles.title: Tax Relief for National Service Act
A bill to amend the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to improve the educational awards provided for national service.
Tax Relief for National Service Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Tax Relief for National Service Act - Amends the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to exclude national service educational awards from their recipients' gross income for federal income tax purposes.
